post0.title: Orange County House Search
post0.content: Historical Prices in the OC Areas . Below are shown the historical prices of houses in each area relative to their estimated price in 2000. The final points in 2021 are based on average asking price per area of the houses we have noted. The sharp rise in 2021 is confirmed by a recent FHFA report for 2021 Q3 . Methodology . Historical prices are taken from the Federal Housing Finance Agency's House Price Index (HPI 2000). This gives the measure $hpi _2000(X)$ for any year $X$ in any zip code. The 2021 points are calculated as follows: . hpi_2000(2021) $ equiv$ hpi_2000(2019) * ( 1 + $ langle frac{zillow _asking(house_i)}{zillow _2019(house_i)} rangle_{i in area})$ . . . Guide to find houses . A comparison of the rating vs asking price of houses are shown below, along with their current status and area. Click the corresponding unit in the legend to remove houses from the plot. . . . Price Change since 2019 . The median increase in asking price relative to 2019 is 40%. Houses below this median are depicted in the green area of the plot, while houses above this are depicted in the red area of the plot. . . . Rating, Price and Square Footage . Our average house rating grows less than linearly with the increase in square footage. . There are several houses with an average rating > 7 beyond 3500 square feet. | . . . The following shows that we are mostly insensitive to price after the square footage of the house is accounted for (with 0.3 change in average rating per 100 increase in price/sqft): . . . . . House of interest . The following houses are sorted by the highest average rating, followed by the price: . status home zillowlink price sqft aveq . 8 For Sale | 30752 Paseo Del Niguel, Laguna Niguel, CA 92677 | https://www.zillow.com/homes/30752-Paseo-Del-N... | 5900000 | 8200 | 9.6 | . 9 For Sale | 27641 Deputy Cir, Laguna Hills, CA 92653 | https://www.zillow.com/homes/27641-Deputy-Cir,... | 3995000 | 6742 | 9.2 | . 10 For Sale | 27773 Hidden Trail Rd, Laguna Hills, CA 92653 | https://www.zillow.com/homedetails/27773-Hidde... | 2199000 | 4000 | 8.5 | . 12 For Sale | 8 Panorama, Coto De Caza, CA 92679 | https://www.zillow.com/homedetails/8-Panorama-... | 2899000 | 5000 | 8.4 | . 13 For Sale | 12 Vista Montemar, Laguna Niguel, CA 92677 | https://www.zillow.com/homedetails/12-Vista-Mo... | 3888000 | 5300 | 8.4 | . 14 For Sale | 25731 Bucklestone Dr, Laguna Hills, CA 92653 | https://www.zillow.com/homedetails/25731-Buckl... | 2500000 | 6799 | 8.3 | . 15 For Sale | 23 Via Lucena, San Clemente, CA 92673 | https://www.zillow.com/homedetails/23-Via-Luce... | 2275000 | 3786 | 8.0 | . 17 For Sale | 3 Canada Oaks, Coto De Caza, CA 92679 | https://www.zillow.com/homedetails/3-Canada-Oa... | 2999000 | 4400 | 7.8 | . <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" height="24px"viewBox="0 0 24 24" width="24px"> </svg>
